result.execSummary:
The defendant Brent J. Kuckkan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Brent J. Kuckkan is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Brent J. Kuckkan was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
2:11 p.m. Defendant Brent J. Kuckkan in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15 tr1069, 15cm249, 15cf103.  Adj. 2:13 p.m. 
2:19 p.m. Defendant Brent J. Kuckan in court.  Steven Michlig in court.  In 15cm249 - State moves to amend Count 2 to an ordinance violation - 343.18(1) Operate w/o valid driver's license on person; dismiss Count 1.  In 15cf103 State moves to amend Count 1 to Possess TCH, A Misdemeanor and to dismiss remaining counts. State moves to dismiss 15tr1069.  Granted.  Defendant will proceed on own. Waiver/benefits of counsel free and voluntary.  Defendant enters no contest pleas.    Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty.
Court Sentence
15cm249 - Fine $200.50
15cf103 - Fine $705.00 - DNA Sample 
The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).
Appeal rights given 
Adj. 2:31 p.m.  Review hearing scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

03:38 pm - Defendant Brent J. Kuckkan in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 15tr1069.  Michlig states met with defendant last week and provided proposal to defendant.  Defendant would be willing to accept proposal.  One conditions is for defendant to provided proof of DL.  Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Brent J. Kuckkan in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
4:20
Also caling 15tr1069
4:23
Defendant now appears in court- states he was sitting out in the hall all afternoon - never came into court- warrant quashed (not yet done) 
Defendant has not obtained counsel - would like to set up appointment to speak with DA - Court will grant adjournment
Bail continued  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Brent J. Kuckkan not in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
3:35
No appearance - Court authorizes warrant

Defendant Brent J. Kuckkan in court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
2:20
Calling 15tr1069
In receipt, right to counsel - 
Michlig to bail - Court sets $  sig bond -  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
